MemoryKernel

class babydragon.memory.kernels.memory_kernel.MemoryKernel[source]
cos_sim(a: ndarray, b: ndarray) → ndarray[source]

Computes the cosine similarity cos_sim(a[i], b[j]) for all i and j. :return: Matrix with res[i][j] = cos_sim(a[i], b[j])

compute_kernel(embedding_set: ndarray, threshold: float = 0.65, use_softmax: bool = False) → ndarray[source]

Compute the adjacency matrix of the graph.

Parameters: embedding_set (numpy array): The embedding matrix of the nodes. threshold (float): The threshold for the adjacency matrix. use_softmax (bool): Whether to use softmax to compute the adjacency matrix. cos_sim_batch (bool): Whether to use batch processing to compute the cosine similarity.

Returns: adj_matrix (numpy array): The adjacency matrix of the graph.

k_hop_message_passing(A: ndarray, node_features: ndarray, k: int) → Tuple[ndarray, ndarray][source]

Compute the k-hop adjacency matrix and aggregated features using message passing.

Parameters: A (numpy array): The adjacency matrix of the graph. node_features (numpy array): The feature matrix of the nodes. k (int): The number of hops for message passing.

Returns: A_k (numpy array): The k-hop adjacency matrix. agg_features (numpy array): The aggregated feature matrix for each node in the k-hop neighborhood.

graph_sylvester_embedding(G: Tuple, m: int, ts: ndarray) → ndarray[source]

Compute the spectral kernel descriptor or the Spectral Graph Wavelet descriptor.

Parameters:

  • G (Tuple) – A tuple containing the graph’s vertices (V) and weights (W).

  • m (int) – The number of singular values to consider.

  • ts (np.ndarray) – The spectral scales.

Returns:

The node_embeddings matrix.

Return type:

np.ndarray

gen_gse_embeddings(A: ndarray, embeddings: ndarray, m: int = 7) → ndarray[source]

Generate Graph Sylvester Embeddings.

Parameters:

  • A (np.ndarray) – The adjacency matrix of the graph.

  • embeddings (np.ndarray) – The original node embeddings.

  • m (int, optional) – The number of spectral scales. Defaults to 7.

Returns:

The generated Graph Sylvester Embeddings.

Return type:

np.ndarray

create_k_hop_index(k: int = 2)[source]

Create a k-hop index by computing the adjacency matrix, k-hop adjacency matrix, aggregated features, and updating the memory index.

Parameters:

k (int, optional) – The number of hops for message passing. Defaults to 2.

classmethod from_task_results(task_memory_index)[source]
